LanguageData.REDS_EnableBlueSpirits: Enable "germline" genes on Spirits (requires game restart)
LanguageData.REDS_EnableBlueSpiritsTooltip: Disabling this toggle will make newly created Spirits appear without the germline genes. Archite genes will remain. Will have no effect on existing Spirits. Will require restarting the game.
LanguageData.REDS_ectoplasmDrainAmountTooltip: Spirits gain +20% ectoplasm per day. The corporeal form, by default, will drain -10% per day. If set to 0, then spirit will gain +20% regardless of form. If set to 2, then corporeal form will offset ectoplasm gain. If set to 20, then corporeal form will rapidly drain ectoplasm.
